body:
This fixes unresolved symbols when building adios2@2.6.0 with gcc10.

A related question: Should PRs like this go against `develop` or `releases/v0.16`? It looks like support for newer adios2 versions (up to 2.7.1) has been added to `develop` back in February, but it's still not in spack 0.16.2.
title: adios2: fix unresolved symbols in 2.6.0 when built with gcc10
